verses.verse: Oh <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
Let the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> [so], <S%H834>Whom<s%> He has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%>
And <S%H6908>gathered<s%> from the <S%H776>lands,<s%> From the <S%H4217>east<s%> and from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> From the <S%H6828>north<s%> and from the <S%H3220>south.<s%>

They <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in a <S%H3452>desert<s%> <S%H3452>region;<s%> They did not <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> to an <S%H4186>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
[They were] <S%H7457>hungry<s%> and <S%H6771>thirsty;<s%> Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> within them.
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H9496>trouble;<s%> He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H1869>led<s%> them also by a <S%H3477>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> To <S%H1980>go<s%> to an <S%H4186>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And for His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For He has <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> the <S%H8264>thirsty<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> And the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> He has <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H9185>what<s%> is <S%H9185>good.<s%>
There were those who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and in the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> <S%H615>Prisoners<s%> in <S%H6040>misery<s%> and <S%H1270>chains,<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> they had <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> And <S%H5006>spurned<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>
Therefore He <S%H3665>humbled<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H5999>labor;<s%> They <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H9496>trouble;<s%> He <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> And <S%H5423>broke<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> <S%H5423>apart.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And for His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For He has <S%H7665>shattered<s%> <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> And <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1438>asunder.<s%>
<S%H191>Fools,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of their <S%H6588>rebellious<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> And <S%H4480>because<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> were <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>
Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8581>abhorred<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> kinds of <S%H400>food;<s%> And they <S%H5060>drew<s%> <S%H5060>near<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H9496>trouble;<s%> He <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> His <S%H1697>word<s%> and <S%H7495>healed<s%> them, And <S%H4422>delivered<s%> [them] from their <S%H7825>destructions.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And for His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them also <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> And <S%H5608>tell<s%> of His <S%H4639>works<s%> with <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>singing.<s%>
Those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H591>ships,<s%> Who <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> on <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in the <S%H4688>deep.<s%>
For He <S%H559>spoke<s%> and <S%H5975>raised<s%> up a <S%H9370>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> Which <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the sea.

They <S%H5927>rose<s%> up to the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> they <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8415>depths;<s%> Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4127>melted<s%> away in [their] <S%H9567>misery.<s%>
They <S%H2287>reeled<s%> and <S%H5128>staggered<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H7910>man,<s%> And were at their wits' <S%H1104>end.<s%>
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in their <S%H9496>trouble,<s%> And He <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H6965>caused<s%> the <S%H9370>storm<s%> to be <S%H1827>still,<s%> So that the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the sea were <S%H2814>hushed.<s%>
Then they were <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H8367>quiet;<s%> So He <S%H5148>guided<s%> them to their <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H4231>haven.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> And for His <S%H6381>wonders<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them <S%H7311>extol<s%> Him also in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> And <S%H1984>praise<s%> Him at the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
He <S%H7760>changes<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> And <S%H4161>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> into a <S%H6774>thirsty<s%> <S%H6774>ground;<s%>
A <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into a <S%H4420>salt<s%> <S%H4420>waste,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> of those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it.
He <S%H7760>changes<s%> a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> into a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> And a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H4161>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%>
And <S%H8033>there<s%> He makes the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> So that they may <S%H3559>establish<s%> an <S%H4186>inhabited<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%>
And <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> And <S%H6213>gather<s%> a <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H8393>harvest.<s%>
Also He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> them and they <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> And He does not let their <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H4591>decrease.<s%>
When they are <S%H4591>diminished<s%> and <S%H7817>bowed<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H4480>Through<s%> <S%H6115>oppression,<s%> <S%H9567>misery,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%>
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> upon <S%H5081>princes,<s%> And makes them <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H3808>pathless<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H8414>waste.<s%>

But He <S%H7682>sets<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H7682>securely<s%> on <S%H7682>high<s%> away from <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> And <S%H7760>makes<s%> [his] <S%H4940>families<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
The <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and are <S%H8055>glad;<s%> But <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9390>unrighteousness<s%> <S%H7092>shuts<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%>? Let him <S%H8104>give<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things;<s%> And <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
